Sometimes you find things in the strangest places. Like under a rock, or in a dusty old book, or, say, embedded in some notes I took while pondering the mysteries of life, the universe, and everything:  Yeah, I don't know either. Just scribbles, you know? Random thought fragments... or maybe...dun dun DUN! Alien code? Nah. Probably just need more coffee.
